overview: “Desire”Is a movie without any story. It is an image of concept with human desire as its symbol. It uses metaphor and symbolization to display human beings’ greedy and indescribable desire through continuous imbroglio between spirit and material.  what is of the most important to explore the new power of movie (Image) languages？
tagline: “Desire”is not describing a story, it is a concept. but a conceptual film based on the nature of the world and the human being.
title: Desire
